---
title: "NanoString Sample 1 Heat Maps"
output: 
  html_document:
    fig_width: 14
    fig_height: 4
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(BrainSABER)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
```


```{r cosSim, echo=FALSE}
data("NanoSample1cosMat")
ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap(t(NanoSample1cosMat), cluster_columns = FALSE,       column_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 8), name = "NanoString Sample 1 Cosine Similarity", heatmap_legend_param = list(title = "Legend"), column_title = "NanoString Sample 1 Cosine Similarity", column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 20, fontface = "bold"))

```



```{r eucSim, echo=FALSE}
data("NanoSample1eucMat")
ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap(t(NanoSample1eucMat), cluster_columns = FALSE,       column_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 8), name = "NanoString Sample 1 Euclidean Distance", heatmap_legend_param = list(title = "Legend"), column_title = "NanoString Sample 1 Euclidean Distance", column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 20, fontface = "bold"))
```
